channel.title: Help with people getting in the server
channel.description: Hey guys my friend splid has just let take over the run of his server although he still runs it sometimes i run it otherwise anyway. He told me to make a new ip. So i went on no.ip and made splidscape2.servegame.com that was the ip for the server so i thought. When i try give it to my friends they say they cannot get in i have no idea why is there anything else i have to do they cant even get in with my ip address not sure why but the only way they can get in is if i use hamachi and quite a few of my friends do not like using hamachi so i would rather not like to use hamachi if anyone could help me it would be much appreciated. All the best. Blaze

item.title: Help with people getting in the server
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Mopar Mod Mopar
item.description:
@Mod_Mopar wrote:

Well, you can forward your ports Take a look at portforward.com But if you have thesame problem as me, it still will not workâ€¦ But i 'm searching for that

Good Luck. (btw, do you like to [rep++] me?

Read full topic
item.source: Help with people getting in the server
